meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unchanging.
meanings.sent1: The unchangingnesses of the old clock brought comfort to the room.
meanings.sent2: The unchangingnesses of the mountain range is a testament to its age.
meanings.sent3: The unchangingnesses of the recipe made it impossible to mess up.
meanings.sent4: His unchangingnesses in opinions made him a reliable friend.
meanings.sent5: The unchangingnesses of the stars in the night sky mesmerized her.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of remaining constant or consistent over time.
meanings.sent1: The unchangingnesses of the weather in the desert surprised the travelers.
meanings.sent2: The unchangingnesses of her routine gave her a sense of stability.
meanings.sent3: The unchangingnesses of the joke made it lose its humor.
meanings.sent4: The unchangingnesses of the river's flow symbolized the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The unchangingnesses of his smile brightened her day.
